name: Hearth
description: Hearth is a survival game where the player must feed their life-sustaining fire. Everything in the world burns, so how you use fire has trade offs. Fuel can be used for weapons, light sources, crafting, or fed to the hearth to regain energy. With cold nights, limited energy, and hostile creatures,  be careful about what you keep and what you burn... by @Super8ude  @viviyurocks @milanimalism Follow @feedthehearth to see our progress!
